0.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize count(), by: {cicd.pipeline.run.outcome}
0.title: Pipeline Completion Status

1.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize count()
1.title: Total Pipeline Executions

10.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, duration
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize median(duration)
10.title: Median Execution Time

11.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize count(), by: {cicd.pipeline.run.trigger}
11.title: Pipeline triggers

18.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter (event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished") 
  or
  ( event.category == "pipeline" and event.type == "run" and event.status == "finished" 
    and in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.name, $Pipeline) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
  )
| summarize { 
  tasks = arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(if(event.category == "task", record(task.name, task.runner.name), else: null))),
  has_matching_runs = countif(event.category == "pipeline")
}, by: { cicd.pipeline.run.id }
| expand tasks
| filterOut has_matching_runs == 0 
| summarize Count=count(), by:{tasks[task.runner.name]} 
| sort Count desc
| limit 5
18.title: Job Runners | Top 5

2.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, duration
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize avg(duration)
2.title: Average Execution Time

20.content:
### GitLab Pipeline Pulse

This dashboard offers a detailed overview of your GitLab pipeline executions, providing valuable insights into the performance and efficiency of your CI/CD pipelines. [Data ingest](https://dt-rnd.atlassian.net/wiki/x/WwLNLg)

24.content:
### Pipeline Details

This section provides a clear and detailed view of the current state of GitLab pipeline executions, enabling you to manage and improve them effectively. 

-----

25.content:
### Job Details

This section will give you a comprehensive view of the detailed performance and status of individual jobs within your GitLab pipelines, enabling you to monitor, analyze, and optimize your CI/CD processes effectively. 

-----

3.title: Job Duration (p50) | Top 5

30.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter (event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished") 
  or
  ( event.category == "pipeline" and event.type == "run" and event.status == "finished" 
    and in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.name, $Pipeline) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
  )
| summarize { 
  tasks = arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(if(event.category == "task", record(task.name,duration), else: null))),
  has_matching_runs = countif(event.category == "pipeline")
}, by: { cicd.pipeline.run.id }
| expand tasks
| filterOut has_matching_runs == 0 
| summarize avg(tasks[duration])
30.title: Average Job Duration

33.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### Additional resources
**Pipeline Observability**
* [Observability throughout the software development lifecycle increases delivery performance](https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/observability-throughout-the-software-development-lifecycle/) (Blog Post)
* [Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/pipeline-observability-concepts) (Docs)

**Software Development Lifecycle Events**
* [Ingest SDLC events](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/sdlc-events) (Docs)
* [SDLC event specification]() (Docs)
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Preview Release v0.3.1, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

34.title: Total Job Executions

35.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, cicd.pipeline.run.outcome
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize successful = countIf(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome == "success")
35.title: Successful Executions

36.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, cicd.pipeline.run.outcome
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize failed = countIf(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome == "failure")
36.title: Failed Executions

37.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, cicd.pipeline.run.outcome
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize other = countIf(isNull(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome) or (cicd.pipeline.run.outcome != "failure" and cicd.pipeline.run.outcome != "success"))
37.title: Other Execution States

38.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter (event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished" and task.outcome == "success") 
  or
  ( event.category == "pipeline" and event.type == "run" and event.status == "finished" 
    and in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.name, $Pipeline) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
  )
| summarize { 
  tasks = arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(if(event.category == "task", record(task.name), else: null))),
  has_matching_runs = countif(event.category == "pipeline")
}, by: { cicd.pipeline.run.id }
| expand tasks
| filterOut has_matching_runs == 0 
| summarize successful=count()
38.title: Successful Job Executions

39.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter (event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished" and task.outcome == "failure") 
  or
  ( event.category == "pipeline" and event.type == "run" and event.status == "finished" 
    and in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.name, $Pipeline) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
  )
| summarize { 
  tasks = arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(if(event.category == "task", record(task.name), else: null))),
  has_matching_runs = countif(event.category == "pipeline")
}, by: { cicd.pipeline.run.id }
| expand tasks
| filterOut has_matching_runs == 0 
| summarize failure=count()
39.title: Failed Job Executions

4.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| fields vcs.repository.url.full, cicd.pipeline.name, cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, cicd.pipeline.run.outcome
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize failureRate = if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100)
4.title: Error Rate

42.title: General reasons for job failure | Top 5

44.title: Queuing time for runners (p50)  | Top 5

46.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab"
| filter (event.category == "task" and event.status == "finished") 
  or
  ( event.category == "pipeline" and event.type == "run" and event.status == "finished" 
    and in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.name, $Pipeline) 
    and in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
  )
| summarize { 
  tasks = arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(if(event.category == "task", record(end_time,task.queued.duration), else: null))),
  has_matching_runs = countif(event.category == "pipeline")
}, by: { cicd.pipeline.run.id }
| expand tasks
| filterOut has_matching_runs == 0 
| fieldsAdd queued = tasks[task.queued.duration],end_time = tasks[end_time]
46.title: Job Queued Durations

5.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| filter cicd.pipeline.run.outcome != "canceled" 
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| summarize percentile(duration,50), alias:Median ,by:{cicd.pipeline.name, alias: name} 
| sort Median desc 
| limit 5
5.title: Pipeline Duration (p50) | Top 5

6.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| summarize failureRate = if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100), by: {vcs.repository.name,cicd.pipeline.name }
| filter failureRate>0 
| sort  failureRate desc 
| limit 5
6.title: Error-prune Pipelines | Top 5

7.title: Error-prone Jobs | Top 5

8.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "pipeline" 
| filter event.type == "run" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "gitlab" 
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository) 
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Pipeline)
| filter in(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger, $Trigger)
| fields 
Duration = duration,
Name = cicd.pipeline.name,
Status = cicd.pipeline.run.outcome,
Run = cicd.pipeline.run.url.full,
Trigger = cicd.pipeline.run.trigger,
Start = start_time,
End = end_time,
Repository = vcs.repository.name 
| sort Duration desc
8.title: Pipeline Execution Details

variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="gitlab" and event.type == "run"
| summarize distinctRepositories = collectDistinct(vcs.repository.url.full)
| expand distinctRepositories
| sort distinctRepositories

fetch events
| filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="gitlab" and event.type == "run"
| filter in(vcs.repository.url.full, $Repository)
| summarize distinctWorkflows = collectDistinct(cicd.pipeline.name)
| expand distinctWorkflows
| sort distinctWorkflows

fetch events
| filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="gitlab" and event.type == "run"
| summarize distinctTriggers = collectDistinct(cicd.pipeline.run.trigger)
| expand distinctTriggers
| sort distinctTriggers
